name: NnsDAO Protocol
description: NnsDAO is a borderless DAO organization, we provide the basic DAO facilities, through DAO services to allow different users and developers to connect together, and eventually form DAOn, DAOs, subDAO, an infinite split sub-DAO model, which allows more people to find fun and collaboration through different DAOs, and realize their own value. NDP is a pass-through to the NnsDAO ecosystem, which enables internal functioning and outreach functions under the NnsDAO ecosystem through circulation incentives, holding votes, and investment dividends.
